text: The Scotts Miracle-Gro Company is an American multinational corporation. It is headquartered in Marysville, Ohio. It manufactures and sells consumer lawn, garden and pest control products, as well as soilless indoor gardening equipment. The company was founded in 1868. Category:Companies based in Ohio Category:1868 establishments in the United States Category:19th-century establishments in Ohio
title: Scotts Miracle-Gro Company
